amendment.description: To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to submit to Congress a report on the utilization of small businesses with respect to certain Federal contracts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 873 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 873 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5792-5793) To require the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to submit to Congress a report on the utilization of small businesses with respect to certain Federal contracts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 873 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 873 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1003.
